meanings.sent1: After getting up, he refalls on the slippery floor.
meanings.sent2: She refalls every time she tries to climb the tree.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy cat refalls off the couch multiple times.
meanings.sent4: Like a leaf in the wind, he refalls from the tree branch.
meanings.sent5: The icy path makes it easy to refalls and slip.

meanings.sent1: The rain refalls just as we thought it was stopping.
meanings.sent2: He refalls into old habits when under stress.
meanings.sent3: The ball refalls down the stairs, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The snow refalls on the mountain, creating a fresh layer.
meanings.sent5: The tears refalls as she remembers the sad news.
